cmp: 子 (11 p.m.-1 a.m./1st earthly branch/child/midnight/son/child/seed/egg/small thing, (noun suff.))
mng: good, well, proper, good to, easy to, very, so, (suffix indicating completion or readiness), (of two people) close, on intimate terms
to be fond of, to have a tendency to, to be prone to

exm.mng: good, well, proper, good to, easy to, very, so, (suffix indicating completion or readiness), (of two people) close, on intimate terms
to be fond of, to have a tendency to, to be prone to
close friend, pal, (social networking website) friend
best, (you) had better (do what we suggest)
useful, serviceable, effective, handy, easy to use
